title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag: Reason for Seahawks' defensive woes, Best WR in football, Joe Judge's 'brilliance' (Football 11/14)
description:
The Superfriends gather to answer your 5-star questions from Apple Podcasts in the much-anticipated return of the Pick Six mailbag. Why do Ryan Wilson and John Breech let Will Brinson off the hook for his horrible predictions? Well, that's the theme of this mailbag. The guys also assess the Cardinals status as contenders and where DeAndre Hopkins ranks among the best wide receivers in football. They also evaluate the first-year coaching performance by Joe Judge and dive into how the Seahawks got so bad on defense. A wild hypothetical ends the show. 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @CodyJBenjamin, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
